alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 1:49PM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal and Valley Areas, the Inland Empire, all of Orange County. * WHEN...From 7 PM today to 4 AM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Small tree limbs and palm fronds could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another Pacific storm could bring strong winds again on Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
